Mythic Slayer

Prerequisite: Slayer

A paragon slayer is an implacable force on the battlefield. Your weapon becomes an extension of your body. It moves with unmatched speed, fluidity, and force. Few foes can withstand your attacks for long.
    You have hacked and slashed your way through numerous foes and endless challenges to reach a state of near-perfect battle prowess. Your weapon has become an almost living extension of your hands and arms, and you can make it perform in ways few other warriors can imagine. The time has come to carve a new legend from the corpses of your fallen enemies.

MYTHIC SLAYER PATH FEATURES

    Level 11 Improved Power Strike (11th level): You gain one more use of power strike per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn.
    Mythic Assault (11th level): When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points using a melee weapon attack, you gain a bonus to your next melee weapon damage roll before the end of the encounter. The bonus equals your Dexterity modifier.
    Mythic Slayer's Action (11th level): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can use a free action to make a melee basic attack either before or after the extra action.
    Level 12 Mythic Slayer Greater Weapon Specialization (12th level): You gain one of the following encounter powers of your choice.
Reaping Axe
You gain the reaping axe power.

Mythic Slayer Utility 12Reaping Axe

You strike with such force that even a glancing blow is felt by your enemy.

Encounter        Martial
Free Action      Melee weapon

Trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using an axe.

Target: The enemy you missed

Effect: The target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.



Serpentine Blade
You gain the serpentine blade power.

Mythic Slayer Utility 12Serpentine Blade

Even when a foe avoids your attack, you seize the advantage.

Encounter        Martial
Free Action      Melee weapon

Trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using a heavy blade.

Target: The enemy you missed

Effect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn or until you or one of your allies attacks it.



Staggering Staff
You gain the staggering staff power.

Mythic Slayer Utility 12Staggering Staff

Your staff whirls in your hands, and your enemy stumbles into just the right place.

Encounter        Martial
Free Action      Melee weapon

Trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using a staff

Target: The enemy you missed

Effect: You slide the target 2 squares.



    Fearless Slayer (16th level): You gain a +3 bonus to damage rolls while you are bloodied.
    Brutal Focus (20th level): When you use power strike, you push the target up to 3 squares, or up to 3 additional squares if the triggering power already pushes the target.
